About

Thank you for buying the PRO version of Hydejack! 🎉

More than one year ago I was looking for a blogging platform but couldn’t find it: One that would let me write posts in markdown with my own editor, one that didn’t look awful buy modern design standards, and one that felt snappy on a mobile phone. That and more is now Hydejack. I hope you enjoy it as much as I do.

First Steps

Start by reading the Documentation. Specifically, the chapters below should be relevant now:

  • Install — How to install and run Hydejack.
  • Config — Once Jekyll is running you can start with basic configuration.

After you’ve familiarized yourself with Hydejack, you can delete the following folders and files containing example content:

├── _featured_categories
│   └── example.md
├── _projects
│   └── *
├── docs
├── example
├── licenses
├── assets
│   └── img
│       ├── blog
│       ├── docs
│       └── projects
├── CHANGELOG.md
├── forms-by-example.md
├── LICENSE.md
└── NOTICE.md

© 2025. All rights reserved.
